trans-unit.source: Represents a collection container that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa um contêiner de coleção que permite que um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> mantenha uma lista de seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> class represents a collection container that enables a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to maintain a list of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> classe representa um contêiner de coleção que habilita um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle para manter uma lista de seus controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls as child controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles como controles filho.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the end of an ordinal index array.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> método para adicionar um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção no final de uma matriz de índice ordinal.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a new control at a specific index location.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método para adicionar um novo controle em um local de índice específico.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at a specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexador para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção em um índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz simples.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle é criado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método é usado para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexador é usado para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controla armazenados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleta e exibi-los para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> control that owns this collection of child controls.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView" /> que possui essa coleção de controles filhos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle é criado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método é usado para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexador é usado para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controla armazenados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleta e exibi-los para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method adds the new control to the end of an ordinal index array.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> método adiciona o novo controle ao final de uma matriz de índice ordinal.

trans-unit.source: The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle só pode ser uma instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle.

trans-unit.source: To add a control to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um controle para a coleção em um local de índice específico, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the `MultiView.Views.Add()` syntax is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle é criado, o `MultiView.Views.Add()` sintaxe é usada para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="v" /> parameter does not specify a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="v" /> não especifica um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" />.

trans-unit.source: The array index at which to add the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de matriz no qual o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> deve ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> especificado à coleção no local do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method adds the new control to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método adiciona o novo controle à coleção no local do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The control can only be an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle só pode ser uma instância de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle.

trans-unit.source: To add a control at the end of an ordinal index array, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um controle no final de uma matriz de ordinais de índice, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle é criado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método é usado para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexador é usado para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controla armazenados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleta e exibi-los para o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="v" /> parameter does not specify a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="v" /> não especifica um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" />.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index value that specifies the location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice ordinal que especifica o local do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> na <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control at the specified index location in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> no local do índice especificado na coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> control in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View" /> controlar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection at the specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz simples.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controles para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle.

trans-unit.source: After each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> method is used to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle é criado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.AddAt%2A> método é usado para adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> o controle para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controle no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexer is used to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> collection and display them to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection.Item%2A> indexador é usado para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controla armazenados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ViewCollection> coleta e exibi-los para o usuário.
